snippet: A spokesman for Iraq’s prime minister said it was an effort to make good on pledges to “make life easier for Iraqis in liberated areas.”
abstract: Iraqi Prime Min Haider al-Abadi lifts nighttime curfew in Baghdad that has been in force for over a decade; move is part of Abadi's pledge to rebuild Iraq.
lead_paragraph: A spokesman for Iraq’s prime minister said it was an effort to make good on pledges to “make life easier for Iraqis in liberated areas.”

headline.main: Decade-Long Night Curfew to Be Lifted in Baghdad
headline.print_headline: Curfew, in Place for Decade, to Be Lifted in Baghdad

keywords.name: organizations
keywords.value: Islamic State in Iraq and Syria (ISIS)
